name: Dreamy (Philip Newsham)
description:
Welcome to a dream - your dream to be exact.

What are you doing here? Not sure, you know you need to do something - give some a thing? Something like that. Go from place to place, meet some people, find strange items and try to find something to wake you up!

Made for the Mini Jam 105: Dreamy, with the limitation that every playthrough is unique!

Hold mouse down to speed up text.

Apologies for any inevitable spelling mistakes!

The lovely font was taken from here: https://www.dafont.com/papernotes.font
